original_text: And the border came down to the end of the mountain that lieth before the valley of the son of Hinnom, and which is in the valley of the giants on the north, and descended to the valley of Hinnom, to the side of Jebusi on the south, and descended to Enrogel,
korean_text: 르바임 골짜기 북쪽 힌놈의 아들 골짜기 앞에 있는 산 끝으로 내려가고 또 힌놈의 골짜기로 내려가서 여부스 남쪽에 이르러 엔 로겔로 내려가고

sentences.original_text: to the end of the mountain
that lieth before the valley of the son of Hinnom
and which is in the valley of the giants on the north
and descended to the valley of Hinnom
to the side of Jebusi on the south
